attributes.action: stop Anjem Choudary benefit payments straight away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM needs to stop Anjem Choudary claiming massive benefits from a country he clearly hates and has no gratitude towards.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions relating to an individual's circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
